snippet.title: Deer Hunter Tournament
snippet.description:
Hunting trip to the mountains.

This game is pure crap.
I really hope someone someday will make decent hunting game.
I would think that the fan base is there. We have 300 000 hunters in Finland only. So one good title could make tons of cash.

Abouth Deer Hunter, everything in this game should be made better. It's 10 years behind time. Feels like some old Atari or Mattel console game.

The most important things would be animal AI, animal animation and the hunting enviroment. Those all are crap too.

I try to find some good things and found only the rain (hardly) and gun sounds (when they work).
